data.title: Oracle Netsuite
data.text:
NetSuite offers PDA members preferred pricing and group discounts, educational events, and networking opportunities through our Associations & Buying Groups program.

Born in the cloud, Oracle NetSuite is the data foundation that companies prefer for enterprise simplicity, speed, and resiliency. Boards value the relationship with a reputable well-established brand and a robust capability that results in stronger governance, reduced risk, and continued innovation. NetSuite provides an integrated system that includes financials / Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), inventory management, HR, professional services automation and omnichannel commerce, used by more than 36,000 customers in 217 countries and dependent territories.

Member Exclusive Pricing: Members will gain access to preferred pricing for NetSuite and related services.

Education: Ongoing educational opportunities via joint webinars, podcasts, in-person educational sessions, and/or presenting at annual association meetings.

Industry Networking: Collaborate with NetSuite’s dedicated Associations and Buying Groups team to discuss best practices and industry challenges, and access NetSuite’s expansive partner network to give your membership base technology solutions for growth.

Streamlined Communication and Support: Associations and their members are provided a central point of contact for questions and escalations to help ensure success.

For any inquiry you might have, please fill out the form below:
